predator.prey.ecosystems - package predator.prey.ecosystems
 
PredatorPreyEcosystems - Class in predator.prey.ecosystems
Class to calculate The Lotka-Volterra model is defined by the following formula: H[n+1] = H[n] + a1 * H[n] - a2*H[n]*L[n] = H[n] * (1 + a1 - a2 * L[n]) L[n+1] = L[n] - b1 * L[n] + b2*H[n]*L[n] = L[n] * (1 - b1 + b2 * H[n])
PredatorPreyEcosystems() - Constructor for class predator.prey.ecosystems.PredatorPreyEcosystems
 
preyPredLV(double[], double[], double[], int) - Static method in class predator.prey.ecosystems.PredatorPreyEcosystems
Calculate the populations of Hare and Lynx in a number of periods using the Lotka-Volterra model.
printResult(double[], int) - Static method in class predator.prey.ecosystems.PredatorPreyEcosystems
Print format data.
